metadata.title: Who We Are | Murphy Ben International
metadata.description: Established in 2009, MBI is Africa's leading content aggregator and digital media powerhouse.

hero.heading: THE ARCHITECTS OF AFRICAN MEDIA
hero.subheading: From a bold vision in 2009 to a global digital empire. We are the bridge between African creativity and the world.

narrative.heading: Our Story
content: Murphy Ben International (MBI) was incorporated in 2009 with a singular vision: to redefine how African entertainment is consumed globally. What started as a passion for Nollywood has evolved into a multi-faceted media conglomerate.

Today, we stand as the continent's largest YouTube Multi-Channel Network (MCN) and content aggregator. We do not just distribute content; we manage the entire value chainâ€”from acquisition and dubbing to monetization and copyright protection.

Our ecosystem includes Aforevo, the leading name in digital movie distribution; Vybz FM, the heartbeat of Afrobeatz radio; and MBI Tech, our proprietary infrastructure division. We are the silent engine powering the visibility of thousands of creators.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We pioneered the digital shift in Nollywood, moving from VCDs to streaming dominance.

items.title: Localization
items.description: We break language barriers by dubbing African stories into French, Swahili, and Spanish.

items.title: Empowerment
items.description: We provide the tools and platforms for independent creators to monetize their art.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We are trusted guardians of intellectual property, fighting piracy with advanced tech.

leadership.heading: Leadership
leadership.text: Led by Murphy Ben, a visionary entrepreneur with over two decades of experience in media rights and digital distribution.
